example.text: Republicans can skip holding a full hearing on their extreme Default on America Act, but they can't stop us from talking about how their cruel cuts and dangerous default threats will harm American families. [[url]]

I just filed a discharge petition to give Congress the flexibility to prevent a catastrophic default. Millions of jobs are on the line — and Congress must do everything in our power to protect American families and our economy from this MAGA-manufactured crisis. [[url]]

MAGA Republicans want to claim they're not cutting veterans' health care. So why does their Default on America Act immediately cut $2B from the VA? Why did they release a bill today that underfunds the veterans' toxic exposures fund by $14.7B?
